user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to sign up using my email and password, so that I can create an account on the blog platform.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create an account using email and password.
Error messages are displayed for invalid inputs.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to log in using my email and password, so that I can access the blog platform.
acceptance_criteria: Users can log in using their credentials.
Error messages are displayed for invalid inputs.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to log in using my social media accounts, so that I can quickly access the blog platform.
acceptance_criteria: Users can log in using Google and Facebook accounts.
Successful login redirects to the homepage.
Error handling for failed login attempts.

user_stories.user_story: As an author, I want to create and publish blog posts, so that I can share content with readers.
acceptance_criteria: Authors can add titles, content, images, and tags.
Posts can be published immediately.
Confirmation message upon successful publishing.

user_stories.user_story: As an author, I want to save blog posts as drafts, so that I can continue editing them later.
acceptance_criteria: Authors can save posts as drafts.
Drafts are accessible from the dashboard.
Drafts can be edited and published later.

user_stories.user_story: As an author, I want to schedule posts for future publication, so that I can manage my posting times.
acceptance_criteria: Authors can set a future date and time for publication.
Scheduled posts are published automatically.
Notification upon successful scheduling.

user_stories.user_story: As an author, I want to edit my blog posts, so that I can update my content.
acceptance_criteria: Authors can edit existing posts.
Changes are reflected immediately.

user_stories.user_story: As an author, I want to delete my blog posts, so that I can remove unwanted content.
acceptance_criteria: Authors can delete posts with confirmation.
Changes are reflected immediately.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to browse through a list of published blogs, so that I can find content that interests me.
acceptance_criteria: Users can view a list of published blogs.
Filters for categories and tags are available.
Pagination for easy navigation.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to search for specific blog posts, so that I can quickly find content.
acceptance_criteria: Users can search using keywords.
Search results are relevant and accurate.
Error handling for no results found.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to read full blog posts, so that I can enjoy the content in a user-friendly interface.
acceptance_criteria: Users can view full blog posts.
Responsive design for different devices.
Clear and readable text formatting.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to leave comments on blog posts, so that I can engage with the content and author.
acceptance_criteria: Users can add comments to posts.
Comments are displayed in chronological order.
Users can edit or delete their comments.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to receive notifications for comments on my posts, so that I stay informed about interactions.
acceptance_criteria: Users receive notifications for new comments.
Notifications are displayed in a user-friendly manner.
Users can clear or manage notifications.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to like or dislike blog posts, so that I can express my opinions.
acceptance_criteria: Users can like or dislike posts.
Total likes and dislikes are displayed.
Users can change their reactions.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to share blog posts on social media, so that I can spread interesting content.
acceptance_criteria: Users can share posts on platforms like Facebook and Twitter.
Sharing options are easily accessible.
Confirmation message upon successful sharing.

user_stories.user_story: As an admin, I want to organize blog posts using tags and categories, so that users can navigate content easily.
acceptance_criteria: Admins can create and manage tags and categories.
Posts can be assigned to multiple tags/categories.
Changes are reflected immediately.

user_stories.user_story: As an author, I want to manage images and media files, so that I can use them in my blog posts.
acceptance_criteria: Authors can upload and manage media files.
Media files can be easily inserted into posts.
Preview of media files before insertion.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to receive email notifications for new posts and interactions, so that I stay updated.
acceptance_criteria: Users receive emails for new posts, comments, and replies.
Users can manage notification preferences.
Emails are sent promptly and reliably.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to customize my profile, so that I can express my identity on the platform.
acceptance_criteria: Users can update profile pictures and bio.
Changes are reflected immediately.
Profile information is displayed correctly.

user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to follow my favorite authors, so that I receive updates on their new posts.
acceptance_criteria: Users can follow/unfollow authors.
Users receive updates on followed authors' posts.
List of followed authors is accessible.

user_stories.user_story: As an author, I want to view engagement metrics, so that I can understand my audience better.
acceptance_criteria: Authors can view metrics like views, likes, and comments.
Metrics are displayed in an easy-to-understand format.
Data is updated in real-time.

user_stories.user_story: As an admin, I want to manage user accounts, so that I can maintain a safe and respectful community.
acceptance_criteria: Admins can ban or moderate users.
User accounts can be edited or deleted.
Changes are reflected immediately.

user_stories.user_story: As an admin, I want to moderate blog posts and comments, so that community guidelines are followed.
acceptance_criteria: Admins can review and approve posts and comments.
Inappropriate content can be flagged and removed.
Moderation actions are logged.
